tn.text: "Yahweh spoke his word." See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:ezk:01:01|1:1]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])

tn.ref: who lives within the gates of the sea
tn.text: "who live at the gates of the sea." This phrase means 1) "who lives by the ports of the sea" or 2) "who rules over the ports of the sea."
Yahweh continues giving Ezekiel his message to Tyre.
